parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authentication header

200.description: Successful response when authenticated with proper role

message.example: Se estiveres autenticado, podes ver isto!

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied due to insufficient permissions

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username provided for authentication; retrieved from WebRequest#getParameter("username"). If omitted, authentication will fail and the response success will be false.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password provided for authentication; retrieved from WebRequest#getParameter("password"). If omitted, authentication will fail and the response success will be false.

200.description: Login response. Returns 'success' boolean. If authentication succeeds, includes a 'user' object and optionally an 'externalURL' string for consumer users.

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: The ID of the print shop

200.description: Successful response with list of employees or failure message

404.description: Print shop not found

parameters.description: The ID of the print shop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Employee object that needs to be added to the print shop

400.description: Invalid input data or employee already exists

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions

404.description: Print shop not found

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: The ID of the print shop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Employee object that needs to be updated

200.description: Employee updated successfully or operation failed

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

parameters.description: The ID of the print shop

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

200.description: 200 response. On success (success=true) returns printshop statistics: nPendingRequests, nInProgressRequests, nFinished, nEmployees, pshopProfit. On failure returns an object with success=false.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token used for authentication (user must have ROLE_MANAGER).

200.description: Successful response. On success returns a 'printshop' object and 'success': true. On failure returns only 'success': false.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The register request object containing manager and print shop information

pShopLatitude.description: Latitude of the print shop location

pShopLongitude.description: Longitude of the print shop location

pShopNIF.description: NIF (tax identification number) of the print shop

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the register request to accept

200.description: Success response indicating whether the register request was accepted

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required ROLE_ADMIN

parameters.name: printRequestID
parameters.description: The ID of the print request to reject

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The reason for rejecting the register request

200.description: Success response indicating the register request was rejected

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required ROLE_ADMIN

404.description: Not Found - Register request with given ID does not exist

403.description: Forbidden

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate for finding nearest print shops

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate for finding nearest print shops

200.description: Successful response with nearest printshops or error indication

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

printshops.description: Map of distances to printshop objects, only present when success is true

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the print shop

200.description: Price table for the print shop

rings.description: Ring binding items organized by type

parameters.description: The ID of the print shop request

newStatus.description: The new status of the print request

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or request body

403.description: Forbidden - user not authorized (requires ROLE_MANAGER or ROLE_EMPLOYEE)

404.description: Print shop or print request not found

500.description: Internal server error - possibly PayPal related

200.description: Successful response. JSON object containing a list of print requests (possibly empty) under 'printrequest' and a 'success' boolean.

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required to access this resource.

403.description: Forbidden - the authenticated user does not have the required role (ROLE_MANAGER or ROLE_EMPLOYEE).

200.description: Success response with history of print shop requests

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authenticated or lacking required roles (ROLE_MANAGER or ROLE_EMPLOYEE)

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required permissions

200.description: A JSON object containing the satisfied requests for the authenticated printshop and a success flag.

example.prinshops: [{"id":1,"name":"Copy Scan","address":"Rua Quinta dos Órfãos 16 S. Vitor (Junto à Universidade do Minho), Braga","latitude":41.557973,"longitude":-8.398398,"nif":"123555378","logo":"logo_1","avgRating":0.0,"priceTable":{},"balance":{"currency":"EUR","integerPart":0,"fractionalPart":0}}]

parameters.name: printRequest
parameters.description: JSON containing printshop IDs and file specifications

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Document files to be processed

additionalProperties.description: Budget value as string for each printshop ID

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required ROLE_USER

parameters.name: printRequestID
parameters.description: ID of the print request to finish and submit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON payload with submission details

printshopID.description: ID of the PrintShop to submit the request to

budget.description: Chosen budget/cost for the print request

paymentMethod.description: Payment method (e.g. proxy payment or paypal)

200.description: Successful operation — always returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success' property; on failure the object may include a 'message' string.

401.description: Unauthorized — authentication is required (enforced by @Secured). The response body is typically a JSON object indicating failure.

403.description: Forbidden — authenticated user does not have the required role (ROLE_USER). The response body is typically a JSON object indicating failure.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: PDF file to be printed

200.description: Success response with print request ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the print request document to retrieve

404.description: Print request not found

parameters.description: The print request ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Array of print shop IDs for which to calculate budgets

additionalProperties.description: Budget value as string for the print shop ID

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required ROLE_USER

404.description: Not Found - Print request with given ID does not exist

parameters.name: printRequestID
parameters.description: The ID of the print request to confirm payment for

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid IPN data received

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error processing IPN notification

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid consumer ID or malformed IPN data

500.description: Internal Server Error - Exception occurred during processing

success.description: Indicates if the registration was successful
Indicates if the registration was successful

200.description: OK. Returns the consumer information when authenticated. Response is a JSON object containing a boolean 'success' and, when successful, a 'consumer' object.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication is required to access this endpoint.

parameters.description: Consumer information to update

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required role

200.description: Success response indicating whether the cancellation was successful

success.description: Indicates whether the cancellation was successful

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have required role (ROLE_USER)

200.description: Successful response: returns the consumer's satisfied print requests history or success=false if consumer not found.

printrequest.description: The PrintRequest object serialized by Gson (contains fields from the PrintRequest model).

printshop.description: The name of the printshop that satisfied the request.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation succeeded (true) or the consumer was not found (false).

200.description: Success response with consumer balance information

403.description: Forbidden - User not authorized to access this resource

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: the id of the consumer.

200.description: Successful response with a success flag and, when successful, an array of printing schemas.

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The printing schema to be added

400.description: Bad request - invalid data in request body

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions

200.description: Success response for deleting a printing schema

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authenticated or lacking required ROLE_USER

500.description: Internal server error - Could occur if the printing schema ID does not exist causing a NullPointerException

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer

parameters.name: printingSchemaID
parameters.description: The ID of the printing schema to edit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The printing schema object with updated values

name.description: The name of the printing schema

paperSpecs.description: Paper specifications in format like PAPER,COLOR,A4,SIMPLEX

bindingSpecs.description: Binding specifications in format like BINDING,STAPLING,0,0

403.description: Forbidden - User lacks required role

404.description: Not Found - Printing schema not found

500.description: Internal Server Error - Update operation failed
